alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 5:01PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will affect Baca and southeastern Las Animas Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 458 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms producing very heavy rain along the Colorado and New Mexico border. these storms were moving to the east-northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain will cause ponding of water along highway 160 across southern Las Animas county. If storms remain persistent, then flash flooding may occur along highway 160. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Baca and southeastern Las Animas Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
